Banjo-Kazooie.Name: Banjo-Kazooie
Banjo-Kazooie.Description: Banjo-Kazooie is a 1998 platform game developed by Rare. Players control Banjo and his friend Kazooie as they try to rescue Banjo's sister Tooty from the evil witch Gruntilda.
Banjo-Kazooie.Creator: Rare

BlastCorps.Name: Blast Corps
BlastCorps.Description: Blast Corps is a 1997 action puzzle game developed by Rare. Players must demolish buildings and clear paths for a runaway nuclear missile carrier.
BlastCorps.Creator: Rare

BodyHarvest.Name: Body Harvest
BodyHarvest.Description: Body Harvest is a 1998 action-adventure game developed by DMA Design. Players must thwart an alien invasion by traveling through time and fighting off aliens in various time periods.
BodyHarvest.Creator: DMA Design

Bomberman64.Name: Bomberman 64
Bomberman64.Description: Bomberman 64 is a 1997 action puzzle game. Players navigate 3D environments to defeat opponents using bombs while solving puzzles.
Bomberman64.Creator: Hudson Soft

ConkersBadFurDay.Name: Conker's Bad Fur Day
ConkersBadFurDay.Description: Conker's Bad Fur Day is a 2001 platform game developed by Rare. Players control Conker as he navigates a world filled with humor and adult themes.
ConkersBadFurDay.Creator: Rare

CookieClicker.Name: Cookie Clicker
CookieClicker.Description: Cookie Clicker is an incremental game developed by Julien 'Orteil' Thiennot. Players click on a large cookie to earn cookies, which can be spent on upgrades and buildings to produce more cookies automatically.
CookieClicker.Creator: Julien 'Orteil' Thiennot

CookieClickerClassic.Name: Cookie Clicker Classic
CookieClickerClassic.Description: Cookie Clicker Classic is the original version of the incremental game developed by Julien 'Orteil' Thiennot. It features the same core mechanics of clicking a cookie to earn cookies, which are used to purchase upgrades and buildings for automated cookie production. This version laid the foundation for future iterations but retains a simpler, more retro experience.
CookieClickerClassic.Creator: Julien 'Orteil' Thiennot

CookingMama.Name: Cooking Mama
CookingMama.Description: Cooking Mama is a cooking simulation game where players prepare various recipes through mini-games. It's known for its charming graphics and engaging gameplay.
CookingMama.Creator: Cooking Mama Limited

CookingMama2.Name: Cooking Mama 2: Dinner With Friends
CookingMama2.Description: The sequel to Cooking Mama, this game offers new recipes and multiplayer modes, allowing friends to join in the cooking fun.
CookingMama2.Creator: Cooking Mama Limited

DiddyKongRacing.Name: Diddy Kong Racing
DiddyKongRacing.Description: Diddy Kong Racing is a 1997 racing game featuring characters from the Rare universe. Players race on various tracks using karts, hovercrafts, and airplanes.
DiddyKongRacing.Creator: Rare

HelloKittyBigCityDreams.Name: Hello Kitty: Big City Dreams
HelloKittyBigCityDreams.Description: In this game, players explore a vibrant city with Hello Kitty, completing tasks and meeting friends in a fun and colorful world.
HelloKittyBigCityDreams.Creator: Sanrio

HelloKittyBirthdayAdventures.Name: Hello Kitty: Birthday Adventures
HelloKittyBirthdayAdventures.Description: Players join Hello Kitty and her friends as they prepare for a birthday party, completing mini-games and challenges.
HelloKittyBirthdayAdventures.Creator: Sanrio

HelloKittyParty.Name: Hello Kitty: Party
HelloKittyParty.Description: A party game featuring Hello Kitty and friends, with various mini-games and activities suitable for players of all ages.
HelloKittyParty.Creator: Sanrio

JetForceGemini.Name: Jet Force Gemini
JetForceGemini.Description: Jet Force Gemini is a 1999 third-person shooter developed by Rare, featuring characters Juno and Vela as they fight against the evil Mizar.
JetForceGemini.Creator: Rare

MarioKart64.Name: Mario Kart 64
MarioKart64.Description: Mario Kart 64 is a 1996 kart racing game featuring characters from the Mario franchise. Players race on various tracks using power-ups and items.
MarioKart64.Creator: Nintendo

LabradorAndFriends.Name: Nintendogs - Labrador & Friends
LabradorAndFriends.Description: Nintendogs - Labrador & Friends is a virtual pet simulation game where players raise, train, and care for puppies of various breeds. The game utilizes the Nintendo DS's touchscreen and microphone for interactive gameplay, allowing players to pet, feed, and teach their virtual dogs new tricks.
LabradorAndFriends.Creator: Nintendo

MyLittlePonyCrystalPrincess.Name: My Little Pony: Crystal Princess - The Runaway Rainbow
MyLittlePonyCrystalPrincess.Description: My Little Pony: Crystal Princess - The Runaway Rainbow is a 2006 adventure game where players help the ponies restore color to Ponyville by completing mini-games and solving puzzles.
MyLittlePonyCrystalPrincess.Creator: Majesco Entertainment

PaperMario.Name: Paper Mario
PaperMario.Description: Paper Mario is a 2000 role-playing game that combines traditional RPG elements with a unique paper aesthetic, following Mario's quest to rescue Princess Peach.
PaperMario.Creator: Intelligent Systems

PokemonCrystal.Name: Pokemon Crystal
PokemonCrystal.Description: Pokemon Crystal is an enhanced version of Pokemon Gold and Silver, introducing animated sprites and the option to play as a female character.
PokemonCrystal.Creator: Game Freak

PaRappertheRapper.Name: PaRappa the Rapper
PaRappertheRapper.Description: PaRappa the Rapper is a rhythm game that follows PaRappa, a paper-thin dog, as he learns various skills by rapping along with his mentors to win the heart of his crush, Sunny Funny.
PaRappertheRapper.Creator: NanaOn-Sha

SuperMario64.Name: Super Mario 64
SuperMario64.Description: Super Mario 64 is a 1996 platform game for the Nintendo 64 and the first in the Super Mario series to feature 3D gameplay. As Mario, the player explores Princess Peach's castle and must rescue her from Bowser.
SuperMario64.Creator: Nintendo

SuperMarioWorld.Name: Super Mario World
SuperMarioWorld.Description: Super Mario World is a 1990 platform game for the Super Nintendo Entertainment System. The player controls Mario or Luigi as they travel through the Dinosaur Land to rescue Princess Toadstool from Bowser, while defeating enemies and completing levels. The game introduces Yoshi, a dinosaur companion.
SuperMarioWorld.Creator: Nintendo

SuperSmashBros.Name: Super Smash Bros
SuperSmashBros.Description: Super Smash Bros is a 1999 fighting game featuring characters from various Nintendo franchises. Players battle in a variety of stages using unique character abilities.
SuperSmashBros.Creator: Nintendo

TurokDinosaurHunter.Name: Turok: Dinosaur Hunter
TurokDinosaurHunter.Description: Turok: Dinosaur Hunter is a 1997 first-person shooter where players control Turok as he battles dinosaurs and other foes in a prehistoric world.
TurokDinosaurHunter.Creator: Acclaim Entertainment

MajorasMask.Name: The Legend of Zelda: Majora's Mask
MajorasMask.Description: Majora's Mask is a 2000 action-adventure game and the direct sequel to Ocarina of Time. Players have three days to save the world of Termina from destruction.
MajorasMask.Creator: Nintendo

OcarinaofTime.Name: The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time
OcarinaofTime.Description: Ocarina of Time is a 1998 action-adventure game where players control Link to stop Ganondorf from obtaining the Triforce and conquering Hyrule.
OcarinaofTime.Creator: Nintendo

WaveRace64.Name: Wave Race 64
WaveRace64.Description: Wave Race 64 is a 1996 jet ski racing game known for its realistic water physics and engaging gameplay.
WaveRace64.Creator: Nintendo
